name: Sudden Reclamation
text: Put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard, then return a creature card and a land card from your graveyard to your hand.

editions.flavor:
"There is no secret buried so deep that we will never find it."
—Kurtar, Sultai necromancer

name: Sudden Shock
text:
Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
Sudden Shock deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

editions.flavor: Arc mages aren't known for their patience.
Arc mages aren't known for their patience.
Arc mages aren't known for their patience.

name: Sudden Spoiling
text:
Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
Until end of turn, creatures target player controls lose all abilities and have base power and toughness 0/2.

name: Sudden Storm
text: Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controllers' next untap steps. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

editions.flavor: No matter how big and strong you are, the sea is bigger and stronger.

name: Sudden Strength
text:
Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
Draw a card.

editions.flavor: The Mirari's magic transformed the Krosan Forest—and its inhabitants.
The Mirari's magic transformed the Krosan Forest—and its inhabitants.

name: Suffering
text: Destroy target land.

editions.set: Duel Decks: Ajani vs. Nicol Bolas

name: Suffer the Past
text: Exile X target cards from target player's graveyard. For each card exiled this way, that player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

editions.flavor: Ulamog's tentacles, their touch like burning ice, rummaged through his soul and stung his memories one by one.

name: Suffocating Blast
text: Counter target spell and Suffocating Blast deals 3 damage to target creature.

name: Suffocation
text:
Cast Suffocation only if you were dealt damage this turn by a red instant or sorcery spell.
Suffocation deals 4 damage to the controller of the last red instant or sorcery spell that dealt damage to you this turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

name: Suicidal Charge
text: Sacrifice Suicidal Charge: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn. Those creatures attack this turn if able.

editions.flavor:
"They think they're winning. But they're just lining up to be dinner."
—Rakka Mar

name: Sulam Djinn
text:
Trample
Sulam Djinn gets -2/-2 as long as green is the most common color among all permanents or is tied for most common.

name: Suleiman's Legacy
text:

Whenever a Djinn or Efreet enters the battlefield, destroy it. It can't be regenerated.

editions.flavor: With Suleiman's ascension to power, the djinn and efreets of ancient Rabiah learned humility.

name: Sulfur Elemental

Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

text: If a red spell would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals that much damage plus 1 to that permanent or player instead.

editions.flavor: It was the dragons who first learned to chase their prey into the vapors before igniting them.

name: Sulfuric Vortex
text:
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Sulfuric Vortex deals 2 damage to that player.
If a player would gain life, that player gains no life instead.

text: At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top two cards of your library. Put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest back on top of your library in any order.

{T}: Add {B}, {G}, or {U} to your mana pool.

• Destroy target monocolored creature.

name: Sultai Emissary

editions.flavor: To the Sultai, Ugin's power was just one more resource to be exploited.
To the Sultai, Ugin's power was just one more resource to be exploited.

editions.flavor: "You can have the body, necromancer. I just want the skin."

name: Sultai Runemark
text:
Enchant creature

Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Flying

editions.flavor: Since they guard armies of walking carrion, Sultai aven are never far from a meal.

name: Sultai Skullkeeper
text: When Sultai Skullkeeper enters the battlefield, put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.

editions.flavor: A skullkeeper is the first to arrive after the palace archers strike down intruders, probing their brains for choice bits of knowledge.

name: Sultai Soothsayer
text: When Sultai Soothsayer enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

editions.flavor: The naga of the Sultai Brood made deals with dark forces to keep their power.

name: Summary Dismissal
text: Exile all other spells and counter all abilities.

editions.flavor: "Let's start fresh, shall we?"

name: Summer Bloom
text: You may play up to three additional lands this turn.

editions.flavor: Summer sends its kiss with warmth and blooming life.
Summer sends its kiss with warmth and blooming life.

"Our love is like the river in the summer season of long rains. / For a little while it spilled its banks, flooding the crops in the fields."
—"Love Song of Night and Day"
Summer sends its kiss with warmth and blooming life.
Summer sends its kiss with warmth and blooming life.

name: Summit Apes
text: As long as you control a Mountain, Summit Apes has menace. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

editions.flavor:
"If you climb Skyfang Peak, avoid the pass. Generations of apes made that trail, and they don't tolerate trespassers."
—Sachir, Akoum Expeditionary House

"Do you not hunt the yetis of the high peaks, stripling? Their meat is as tender as a bear's and their blood as warming as fire. They are prey that will please Atarka."
—Surrak, the Hunt Caller

"Do you hunt the yetis of the high peaks, stripling? They are as fierce as the bear that fears no foe and as sly as the mink that creeps unseen. You will be as much prey as they."
—Nitula, the Hunt Caller

name: Summoner's Bane

Whenever you cast a creature spell with one of the chosen names, you may search your library for a creature card with the other chosen name, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
